channel.title: Handy Script on I Code You
channel.description: Recent content in Handy Script on I Code You

item.title: Find and Kill Process Locking on Mac's Specific Port
item.description: For example we want to kill a process locking at port 8080 With netstat $ kill -9 $(netstat -vanp tcp | grep 8080 | grep LISTEN | awk '{print $9}') With lsof (this command may need sudo operation) $ sudo kill -9 $(echo $(lsof -i tcp:8080 | awk '{print $2}') | cut -d' ' -f 2) Credits: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3855127

item.title: Remove All git Files From a Directory Recursively
item.description: Go to your directory $ cd to/my/directory Find all git related files recursively and remove all ( find . -type d -name ".git" \ && find . -name ".gitignore" \ && find . -name ".gitmodules" ) | xargs rm -rf Credits: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4822321

item.title: Delete .DS_Store Recursively
item.description: Go to your directory $ cd to/my/directory Find all .DS_Store files recursively and remove all $ find . -name '.DS_Store' -type f -delete Credits: https://jonbellah.com/articles/recursively-remove-ds-store

item.title: MacBook Pro Camera Built-in Not Working
item.description: Open a terminal and type: `$ sudo killall VDCAssistant` above command should fix Camera issue on Your MacBook Pro Credits: https://discussions.apple.com/thread/4282533

item.title: Check jQuery Version
item.description: Run below short code inside Firebug or Chrome Developer Tools Console and shortly you will notice output like this: > jQuery.fn.jquery > "1.8.3"
